krag.name: Krag the Immovable
krag.title: Chief Enforcer of Tío the Hutt
krag.description: Tío the Hutt’s top muscle, a hulking enforcer who ensures debts are collected and problems disappear—permanently if needed.
krag.philosophy: Fear prevents problems. Violence ends them.
krag.voiceStyle: Low, direct, confident. Speaks like someone who never needs to repeat himself.
krag.tooltip: Krag reflects your character through raw presence and uncompromising enforcement

levelGreetings.1: So, you wanna be muscle, eh? Good. Tío likes people who make problems disappear.
levelGreetings.2: You’re learning fast. Presence matters—make ’em sweat before you touch ’em.
levelGreetings.3: Walk into a room like you own it. Half the trouble handles itself.
levelGreetings.4: People whisper when they hear your footsteps. That’s power.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway to being my right hand. Debts collected. Problems solved.
levelGreetings.6: You know when to talk and when to smash. Most never learn that.
levelGreetings.7: When negotiations fail, they call me… and now they call you.
levelGreetings.8: You’re becoming a story told in the dark. Reliable. Ruthless.
levelGreetings.9: The big jobs are coming. Make every move count.
levelGreetings.10: You’re top enforcer now. Trouble walks out—or gets carried out.

guidance.class: Pick what makes you stronger, faster, and scarier.
guidance.talents: Hit harder, intimidate better, survive longer.
guidance.multiclass: Sometimes brains solve what fists can’t.
guidance.hp: If you can’t take hits, you won’t last.
